description:
A puppet master visits a strange temple.  A goddess is punished for her dalliances.  An arrogant whale loses a race.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ningyoutsukai / Kawaya no Kamisama / Kujira to Namako
The Puppet Master / The God of the Bathroom / The Whale and the Sea Cucumber
人形使い / 厠の神様 / 鯨となまこ
